creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Crosby in memory of Mrs. Albert W. Hastings
description: taper box and cover, decorated with a line of beading around the base, cover and on the handle, there is a nozzle in the cover, through which protrudes one end of the taper coiled within the box, a cap snuffer is attached to the handle of the box by a silver chain and then hooked on to the side of the box
title: Taper box and cover
